title: Alpecin-Deceuninck Boss Calls Out Rivals for Lack of Support in Mads Pedersen Chase
content:
Christoph Roodhooft on Gent-Wevelgem tactics: “I thought that this was a big race in which the first place was very important”.

Read the full article at Alpecin-Deceuninck Boss Calls Out Rivals for Lack of Support in Mads Pedersen Chase on Velo.
author: sstokes
